form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Part 4  Sponsored Immigrant/Household Member's Promise, Form I-864A ( (11/05/01)Y Page 3

full_text: Screened by NARA, 9/14/2023 Part 4. Sponsored Immigrant/Household Member's Promise I, THE SPONSORED IMMIGRANT/HOUSEHOLD (Print name o sponsored immigrant) in consideration of the sponsor's promise to complete and file the affidavit of support on behalf of the sponsored immigrant(s) accompanying me: 1) Promise to provide any and all financial support necessary to assist the sponsor in maintaining any sponsored immigrant(s) immigrating with me at or above the minimum income provided for in section 213A(a)(1)(A) of the Act (not less than 125 percent of the Federal Poverty Guidelines) during the period in which the affidavit of support is enforceable; 2) Agree to be jointly and severally liable for payment of any and all obligations owed by the sponsor under the affidavit of support to any sponsored immigrant(s) immigrating with me, to any agency of the Federal Government, to any agency of a state or local government, or to any private entity; 3) Agree to submit to the personal jurisdiction of any court of the United States or of any state, territory, or possession of the United States if the court has subject matter jurisdiction of a civil lawsuit to enforce this contract or the affidavit of support; and 4) Certify under penalty of perjury under the laws of the United States that all the information provided on this form is tru and correct to the best of my knowledge and belief and that the income tax returns I submitted in support of the sponsor's affidavit of support are true copies of the returns filed with the Internal Revenue Service. Par FOIA (b)(6) Date: 04/08/2005 nature Subscribed and sworn to (or affirmed) before me this 8TH day of APRIL , 200 5 (Month) (Year) at PALM BEACH COUNTY My commission expires on 02/01/2008 Signature of Notary Public or Officer Administering Oath Title Gary Lucien Commission #DD276394 Expires: Feb 01, 2008 Borded Thru Atlantic Bonding Co., Inc. Part 6. Household Member's or Sponsored Immigrant/Household Member's Signature FOIA (b)(6) Date: 04/08/2005 Household Member's or Sponsored Immigrant/Household Member's Signature Subscribed and sworn to (or affirmed) before me this 8TH day of APRIL , 2005 (Month) (Year) at PALM BEACH COUNTY . My commission expires on 02/01/2008 NOTARY PUBLIC Signature of Notary Public or Officer Administering Oath Title day Lucien Commission #DD276394 Expires: Feb 01,2008 Borded Thru Atlantic Bonding Co.,Inc.
